name: Space Dash
description:
Space Dash is a space-themed endless runner, where collecting oxygen is needed to stay alive.

Controls: 1 button (Space bar for PC, Tap on Android). Press once to jump, press and hold to boost, sacraficing oxygen.

This game was created over a six week period, as a student project with the following team:

  • Designers
    • Shannon Cross
    • Casey Lehmann
    • Lucy Andreasen
  • Artists
    • Bailey O'Brien
    • Richard Jones
    • Josh McKay
  • Programmers
    • Jack Vine
